盛土: (もりど) - embankment (for road, railway, etc.); raising the ground level; fill
盛土地盤: (もりつちじばん) - raised ground level
盛塩: (もりしお) - placing salt by the entrance to one's establishment to bring good luck; such piles of salt
盛大に趣く: (せいだいにおもむく) - to grow in prosperity
盛年重ねて来たらず: (せいねんかさねてきたらず) - Time and tide wait for no man
盛時: (せいじ) - prime of life; era of national prosperity
盛相: (もっそ) - cylindrical box used to measure rice; shape for forming rice; single serving of rice (esp. as prison food)
盛砂: (もりずな) - ceremonial piles of sand (placed on both sides of an entrance to greet an important personage)
盛粧: (せいそう) - thick makeup; heavy makeup
盛糟: (もっそ) - cylindrical box used to measure rice; shape for forming rice; single serving of rice (esp. as prison food)
盛者: (せいじゃ) - prosperous person; powerful person
盛者必衰: (せいじゃひっすい) - (yoji)  Even the prosperous inevitably decay (from the Humane King Sutra); sic transit gloria mundi
盛花: (せいか) - flower arrangement in a built-up style; (もりばな only)  placing salt by the entrance to one's establishment to bring good luck/such piles of salt; (せいか only) seasonal peak of flowers
盛菓子: (もりがし) - cakes heaped in a container for a shrine offering
盛蕎麦: (もりそば) - chilled soba served on a dish (often on a wicker basket or in a shallow steaming basket) with dipping sauce
盛行: (せいこう) - frequency/popularity/currency; to perform well/to be successful in an activity
盛衰: (せいすい) - rise and fall; ups and downs; welfare; vicissitudes
盛衰興亡: (せいすいこうぼう) - (yoji) rise and fall; ups and downs; waxing and waning; prosperity and decline; vicissitudes
盛装: (せいそう) - dressed up; wearing rich clothes
盟う: (ちかう) - to swear; to vow; to take an oath; to pledge
盟を結ぶ: (めいをむすぶ) - to form an alliance
盟約: (めいやく) - oath; pledge; pact; covenant; alliance
盡す: (つくす) - to exhaust/to run out; to devote/to serve (a person)/to befriend; to do to exhaustion
監主: (かんじ) - one of the six administrators of a Zen temple who substitutes for the chief priest
監修: (かんしゅう) - (editorial) supervision/general editorship; supervising director (of anime, TV series etc.)
監修者: (かんしゅうしゃ) - general (supervising) editor; editor-in-chief
監察医: (かんさつい) - medical coroner; medical examiner
監察御史: (かんさつぎょし) - imperial censor; ancient Chinese official in charge of inspecting other officials
監寺: (かんじ) - one of the six administrators of a Zen temple who substitutes for the chief priest
監査報告書: (かんさほうこくしょ) - audit report
監査委員: (かんさいいん) - supervisory auditor; member of inspection committee
監査検討ファイル: (かんさけんとうファイル) - audit-review file
監査証跡: (かんさしょうせき) - audit trail
監理ポスト: (かんりポスト) - supervised trading of a stock, e.g. during delisting
監理銘柄: (かんりめいがら) - supervised trading of a stock, e.g. during delisting
監的: (かんてき) - checking (if an arrow has hit its target); marking; person who checks if an arrow has hit its target
監督: (kantoku) - supervisão, controle, superintendência, direção; diretor, superintendente, supervisor, treinador, capataz, gerente, encarregado, controlador, chefe
監督会議: (かんとくかいぎ) - managers' conference; meeting of managers
監督委員会: (かんとくいいんかい) - supervisory board
監督教会: (かんとくきょうかい) - Episcopal Church
監督機関: (かんとくきかん) - supervising body; supervisory authorities
監督者: (かんとくしゃ) - superintendent; supervisor; warden
監視: (kanshi) - monitoramento, vigilância, observação, supervisão, guarda, supervisão, vigia
監視プログラム: (かんしプログラム) - monitoring program; supervisor
監視体制: (かんしたいせい) - surveillance system; monitoring system
監視所: (かんしじょ) - lookout post; observation point
盤: (ban) - tray , disk, disc, record, clock face; tray, shallow bowl; grid, board (por exemplo, no shogi)
